name: F:\RAI_EP\apps\api\test\generative-engine.adversarial.spec.ts
tests: GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-01: Should reject generation if seed derivation is bypassed (Direct Seed Injection attempt)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-02: Should throw if Date.now() is called inside generative context
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-03: Should throw exactly if Math.random() is called inside generative context
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-04: Should produce identical hash for different key order (Canonicalization)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-05: Should normalize whitespace in string values if implemented (or raw strings preserved)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-06: Should throw on Circular JSON input
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-07: Should throw on undefined values in strict mode (or handle per contract)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-08: Should omit null values (Contract §1)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-09: Should normalize float precision (Contract §1)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-10: Should handle large payload reasonably (or fail gracefully)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-11: Should not serialize prototype properties
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-12: Should handle Unicode Normalization (NFC)
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-13: Should produce different result if input strategy changes even slightly
GenerativeEngine Adversarial Tests (G-IMPL-5) ADV-14: Should produce different result if strategy version changes

name: F:\RAI_EP\apps\api\src\modules\generative-engine\deterministic\canonical-sorter.spec.ts
tests: CanonicalSorter CANON-01: Idempotency должен быть idempotent для простого объекта
CanonicalSorter CANON-01: Idempotency должен быть idempotent для вложенного объекта
CanonicalSorter CANON-01: Idempotency assertIdempotent должен пройти для валидного canonical
CanonicalSorter CANON-01: Idempotency assertIdempotent должен throw для невалидного JSON
CanonicalSorter CANON-02: Order Independence ключи в разном порядке → одинаковый canonical
CanonicalSorter CANON-02: Order Independence вложенные объекты с разным порядком ключей → одинаковый canonical
CanonicalSorter CANON-03: Deep Recursion массивы НЕ пересортировываются (domain order)
CanonicalSorter CANON-03: Deep Recursion вложенные массивы объектов — объекты сортируются, массивы нет
CanonicalSorter CANON-03: Deep Recursion глубоко вложенные структуры
CanonicalSorter CANON-04: Edge Cases null в объекте → пропускается
CanonicalSorter CANON-04: Edge Cases null в массиве → пропускается
CanonicalSorter CANON-04: Edge Cases undefined → throw
CanonicalSorter CANON-04: Edge Cases Date → ISO 8601 string
CanonicalSorter CANON-04: Edge Cases Infinity → throw
CanonicalSorter CANON-04: Edge Cases NaN → throw
CanonicalSorter CANON-05: String Normalization NFC normalization для строк
CanonicalSorter CANON-06: Float Precision float → toFixed(6)
CanonicalSorter CANON-06: Float Precision integer остаётся integer
CanonicalSorter CANON-06: Float Precision float с trailing zeros → toFixed(6)
CanonicalSorter CANON-07: Unsupported Types function → throw
CanonicalSorter CANON-07: Unsupported Types symbol → throw
CanonicalSorter CANON-08: Real-world GenerationParams GenerationParams каноникализируется детерминированно

name: F:\RAI_EP\apps\api\src\modules\generative-engine\deterministic\seed-manager.spec.ts
tests: SeedManager SEED-01: Deterministic Derivation одинаковый input → одинаковый seed string
SeedManager SEED-01: Deterministic Derivation результат должен быть валидным uint32 в строковом виде
SeedManager SEED-01: Deterministic Derivation разный input → чаще всего разный seed (SHA-256)
SeedManager SEED-02: No Random Fallback пустая строка → throw SeedDerivationError
SeedManager SEED-02: No Random Fallback null/undefined в resolveSeed без explicitSeed → throw
SeedManager SEED-03: Explicit Seed Validation валидный uint32 string → возвращает как есть
SeedManager SEED-03: Explicit Seed Validation не-числовая строка → throw SeedDerivationError
SeedManager SEED-03: Explicit Seed Validation отрицательное число → throw SeedDerivationError
SeedManager SEED-03: Explicit Seed Validation число > 2^32-1 → throw SeedDerivationError
SeedManager SEED-03: Explicit Seed Validation пустая строка → throw SeedDerivationError
SeedManager SEED-04: Resolve Policy если есть explicitSeed → использует его
SeedManager SEED-04: Resolve Policy если нет explicitSeed → вычисляет из каноникализации
SeedManager SEED-05: PRNG Sequence Determinism одинаковый seed → одинаковая последовательность [0, 1)
SeedManager SEED-05: PRNG Sequence Determinism разный seed → разная последовательность

name: F:\RAI_EP\apps\api\src\modules\generative-engine\fsm\draft-state-manager.spec.ts
tests: DraftStateManager handlesStatus должен возвращать true для GENERATED_DRAFT

DraftStateManager canTransition должен ЗАПРЕЩАТЬ переходы если роль SYSTEM/AI (I17)
